programme.title: Assassinaut
programme.desc: A team of four teenage astronauts brave the alien wilderness of a distant planet to save the Earth’s President from a deadly assassin.

programme.title: Dark Sense
programme.desc: Simon, a young man with exceptional powers, tracks down a serial killer, battling not only his own demons but a government agency that has decided Simon is too dangerous to be allowed to roam free. Based on a bestseller by Peter Flannery.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 3
programme.desc: From the mysterious mutilation of the black dahlia up to the 2017 Delphi murders, no stone is left unturned in Dread: The Unsolved; A mysterious docuseries from Dread Central.

programme.title: Babysitter Must Die
programme.desc: A wealthy family's home is invaded during a game of hide-and-seek by a pack cultists. Josie, the babysitter hides in plain sight prepared and armed with a handful of survival skills. She battles the cult and her fears through a long night of terror. Ultimately good defeats evil and she triumphs, but not before a cruel twist reveals the cult were just foot soldiers for a much greater evil.

programme.title: Artik
programme.desc: A comic book obsessed serial killer teaches his son how to get away with a series of brutal murders until the boy befriends a mysterious man who threatens to expose everything.

programme.title: The Swerve
programme.desc: The dark secrets of Holly's seemingly perfect life are exposed when an unwanted intruder spins her life out of control forever.

programme.title: Harpoon
programme.desc: Rivalries, dark secrets, and sexual tension emerge when three best friends find themselves stranded on a yacht in the middle of the ocean desperate for survival.

programme.title: Assassinaut
programme.desc: A team of four teenage astronauts brave the alien wilderness of a distant planet to save the Earth’s President from a deadly assassin.

programme.title: Dark Sense
programme.desc: Simon, a young man with exceptional powers, tracks down a serial killer, battling not only his own demons but a government agency that has decided Simon is too dangerous to be allowed to roam free. Based on a bestseller by Peter Flannery.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 4
programme.desc: A deep dive into the depths of unsolved murders, mysteries, and myths with narrator Jans Holstrom.

programme.title: Babysitter Must Die
programme.desc: A wealthy family's home is invaded during a game of hide-and-seek by a pack cultists. Josie, the babysitter hides in plain sight prepared and armed with a handful of survival skills. She battles the cult and her fears through a long night of terror. Ultimately good defeats evil and she triumphs, but not before a cruel twist reveals the cult were just foot soldiers for a much greater evil.

programme.title: Artik
programme.desc: A comic book obsessed serial killer teaches his son how to get away with a series of brutal murders until the boy befriends a mysterious man who threatens to expose everything.

programme.title: The Swerve
programme.desc: The dark secrets of Holly's seemingly perfect life are exposed when an unwanted intruder spins her life out of control forever.

programme.title: Harpoon
programme.desc: Rivalries, dark secrets, and sexual tension emerge when three best friends find themselves stranded on a yacht in the middle of the ocean desperate for survival.

programme.title: Zombiology
programme.desc: When a monster from a popular animated show appears and starts a zombie outbreak, it’s up to eccentric duo Lung and Chi-Yeung to stand up and fight the horde of the recently deceased, and save their friends from all around chaos!

programme.title: Big Ass Spider!
programme.desc: The unlikely heroic duo of a blue-collar exterminator and Latino security guard must save the day when a military major loses control of a giant spider rampaging through the city of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Lost Child
programme.desc: An army veteran returns home to find her brother, only to discover a lost boy in the woods behind her home. After taking him in, she discovers local folklore about a lifedraining spirit that comes in the form of a child; the Tatterdemalion.
